current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_2: .3 miles south of 1007 E. Highland Ave.
case_circumstances: John Doe #09-99 was found on the slopes of a small hill in San Bernardino.  He had apparently committed suicide.  He was estimated to be a White male, between 25 to 50 years, 5'9" in height.  His weight was over 125 lbs.  Identity may only be established with fingerprints (on file and see attached image), dental X-rays (on file and see attached) and DNA (refer to CODIS #BK-08-001367).  Possible comparison with "smiling photographs" (showing teeth).

case_footwear: Black and white athletic shoes ("Vans") - size not recorded
